attributes.action: Deploy thousands of British troops over the UK to protect our streets!
attributes.additional_details: Having troops over the UK may prevent many planned attacks. And having armed forces around means we are always quick to act upon there ever being an attack!
attributes.background:
Incidents that happened in Paris recently should encourage the government to deploy troups around the Uk to allow maximum security. The attacks on Paris show ISIS know what they're doing. They will attack, 
For when they do, we need the security there.
